name: SeeMovie

messages.content: Which cinema do you wish to go to?

sampleUtterances: I want to watch a movie at {MovieLocation}
I want to go to the movies at {MovieLocation}
I would like to go to the movies in {MovieLocation}
I'd like to go to the cinema
I would like to go to the {MovieLocation} cinemas
I want to go to the {MovieLocation} cinema
I want to see a movie
